section.p: Add getApiVersion call, make major change to prepareData and make it also support archive by datafile.

ul.li: getApiVersion call added to return version of server
ids.properties values: preparedCacheSize1024bytes, datasetCacheSize1024bytes, compressDatasetCache, and tolerateWrongCompression are no longer used.
ids.properties value preparedCount has changed its meaning.
ids.properties value tidyBlockSize has been added.
The json string returned by getServiceStatus has changed.

section.p: For two level storage clean up main storage as needed.

ul.li: Add parameters: startArchivingLevel1024bytes, stopArchivingLevel1024bytes and linkLifetimeSeconds.
Cope with some obscure file checker errors.
Datasets are archived when main storage becomes too full.

section.p: Provide background file checking and facility control of returned zip file structure.

ul.li: Provide background file checking - which requires that the parameter checkFiles.parallelCount is set to an integer. If the integer is non zero then other entries must be set in the ids.properties file.
ids.properties needs a new parameter: plugin.zipMapper.class which identifies the code to define the zip file structure.
Files are now being closed properly to avoid running out of file handles.
